extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISTE    Registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.

basic.description: A basic survey of Europe since 1789. Topics include the origins and consequences of the French Revolution; the Industrial Revolution; the development of parliamentary democracy; nationalism; the origins and consequences of the Russian Revolution; imperialism; the two World Wars; fascism; communism.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: European Politics and Society Since 1789
